%vlocity_namespace%__Element__c.Name: TechnicalResolution
%vlocity_namespace%__Element__c.%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c:
{"controlWidth":12,"label":"TextBlock1","text":"

Below are few recommended steps to resove Technical Issues as a self service support.

  • Clear Cache and Cookies
  • Try Loading the Website From Another Device
  • Change Your Network
  • Disable Your VPN or Proxy
  • Disable Your Antivirus or Firewall Software
  • Disable Browser Extensions
  • Renew Your IP
  • Flush Your DNS Cache
  • Change Your DNS Server
","show":{"group":{"operator":"AND","rules":[{"data":"Technical","condition":"=","field":"CaseType"}]}},"dataJSON":false,"HTMLTemplateId":"","textKey":"","sanitize":false}

%vlocity_namespace%__Element__c.Name: StructuralResolution
%vlocity_namespace%__Element__c.%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c:
{"controlWidth":12,"label":"TextBlock2","text":"

Below are few recommended steps to resove Biiling Issues as a self service support.

  1. On your computer, go to subscriptions in Google Play.
  2. For the subscription you want to check, click Manage. 
  3. Click Open Billing.
  4. Within the confirmation pop-up, select a month.
  5. Click Continue.
  6. Your app usage metrics will be mentioned at the bottom.
  7. Click Download to get the PDF.
","show":{"group":{"operator":"AND","rules":[{"data":"Structural","condition":"=","field":"CaseType"}]}},"dataJSON":false,"HTMLTemplateId":"","textKey":"","sanitize":false}

%vlocity_namespace%__Element__c.Name: OtherResolution
%vlocity_namespace%__Element__c.%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c:
{"controlWidth":12,"label":"TextBlock3","text":"

Some Common steps for resolving Issues using Self Support

  • Differentiate fact from opinion.
  • Specify underlying causes.
  • Consult each faction involved for information.
  • State the problem specifically.
  • Identify what standard or expectation is violated.
  • Determine in which process the problem lies.
  • Avoid trying to solve the problem without data.
","show":{"group":{"operator":"AND","rules":[{"data":"Technical","condition":"<>","field":"CaseType"},{"field":"CaseType","condition":"<>","data":"Structural"}]}},"dataJSON":false,"HTMLTemplateId":"","textKey":"","sanitize":false}
